data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve detailed business information by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves comprehensive details for a specific business using its business ID or alias. Returns a Business object containing information such as name, location, contact details, hours, ratings, and other business attributes.
data.reasoning: Original summary lacks specificity about the required business ID parameter. data.current_description: Returns Business Insights information for the provided businesses. This endpoint is part of Yelp Fusion Insights.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve business insights for specified businesses
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves Business Insights data for one or more specified businesses. This endpoint is part of Yelp Fusion Insights and requires appropriate permissions.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description mentions 'provided businesses' but doesn't clarify the input format (list, comma-separated, etc.). data.current_description: Returns the list of food & drinks offered at the business, including trending items and raw ingredients. This endpoint is part of Yelp Fusion Insights.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves food and drinks insights for a specific business using its business ID or alias.
